summary: Happy Halloween! This update includes a variety of bug fixes and optimizations, as well as some new features and improvements. The Spooky Shuffle helper userscript has been integrated, so please remove the userscript if you have it installed. Enjoy!

details.title: General
items: Updated data and cache storage to be more organized
Optimized performance
Fixed miscellaneous bugs

details.title: Better Gifts
items: Added close button to gift confirmation popup

details.title: Better Inventory
items: Fixed item views showing when interacting with items
Fixed conflict with Qol userscript lock buttons

details.title: Better Journal
items: Added support for formatted quantity X item style journal entries as loot list
Updated styles and text replacements for some journal entries

details.title: Better King's Reward
items: Optimized performance
Fixed error being thrown in rare cases

details.title: Better Maps
items: Fixed sidebar list trying to load when sidebar is hidden

details.title: Better UI
items: Updated styles

details.title: Catch Rate Estimator & Minlucks
items: Added 'Show catch rate indicator above trap view' option

details.title: Custom Background
items: Fixed custom background not being applied during events

details.title: Custom Horn
items: Fixed custom horn not being applied during events

details.title: Custom Shield
items: Fixed custom shield not being applied during events

details.title: Favorite Setups
items: Updated equipping to disarm bait/charm if setup is saved without them

details.title: Location HUDs: Bountiful Beanstalk
items: Added 'Bountiful Beanstalk: Show quick Auto-Harp toggle' option
Updated styles

details.title: Location HUDs: Draconic Depths
items: Updated styles

details.title: Location HUDs: School Of Sorcery
items: Updated styles

details.title: Location HUDs: Event Locations
items: Updated Halloween HUD styles
Added Spooky Shuffle tracker

details.title: Native Dark Mode
items: Updated styles
